Atlanta.Druid Hills Baptist Church: Druid Hills Baptist Church is a Baptist church, founded in July 1914 and located at 1085 Ponce de Leon Ave NE at the corner of Highland Avenue in the Poncey-Highland neighborhood in the city of Atlanta. Designed by architect Edward Bennett Dougherty (b. 1876), the Beaux-Arts Style building is remarkable for its massive columns and the orb-shaped designs woodwork surrounding the baptistery.
